title: Dance Central
description: From the creators of Rock Band™ comes the next great music experience: Dance Central™. Take your moves to the next level in the first controller-free, body tracking, fully immersive dance video game.

childDownloads.title: Angel's "Chill" Outfit
childDownloads.description: Download this Avatar Item! Show off your sultry side in Angel's "Chill" look -- perfect for a night out at the hottest salsa club.  (Dance Central, Dance Central 2, Dance Central 3)

childDownloads.title: "Because of You" - Ne-Yo
childDownloads.description: (Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB) Master new moves and build your track library by purchasing this song/dance: “Because of You” by Ne-Yo. For music credits, visit www.DanceCentral.com. Dance Central is a Kinect Required game.
